attributes.action: Allow Watford footballer Al Bangura to stay in the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The details of this case are amazing. A young footballer with a partner and child will be deported, pending the results of the inevitable appeal, back to Sierra Leonne. This man is a productive member of our society, paying top line income tax. Furthermore should he be returned to his homeland he would be in danger due to escaping civil war twice and his fathers connections.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct correspondence with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
